'''''School Days''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to read all three books in the [[House of Daena]] before following [[Kaveh]] to [[Port Ormos]] during ''The Temple of Wisdom'' in {{Quest|The First Ideal}}.
